description: My place is close to Barclays Center, Atlantic/Pacific Terminal (2,3,4,5,B,D,Q,M,N,R,LIRR), C Train (Lafayette Ave.) G train (Fulton St) BAM Harvey Theater, wonderful restaurants, bars, cafes, Ft. Greene park, and so much more.  15 minutes to Manhattan.. You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, the space, the charm, the quiet, the nearby activity. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: ENTIRE 1 BR APT in Charming Ft. Greene Brownstone
